item.title: Flying tips smelly toilet and rubbish, 11th July
item.description:
My parent have lived in the area a caught number 60 willow lane london se18 5tb dump rubbish against the wall she have conform thêm three time to remove it and they refuse in a very hot whether we have smelly toilet the smell is unbelievable . it have come if possible a warning sign needed to put on the wall as it become a point of flying tips from everyone adding.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Lane, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Flytipping in my personal general waste, 11th July
item.description:
Thursday 3 July - Left General waste wheelie on kerbside Friday 4 July - Neighbour reported the wheelie bin felt heavy after the bin collection had been Monday 7 July - I returned from weekend away to find the bin full of trade waste I came back home from a weekend away to find my general waste full of fly tipped waste from a tradesperson. As it is fly tipped I need it collected urgently or will be forced to leave it on the kerbside. I am a single mother and work full time so would really appreciate your help as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clock House Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black gang tag graffiti on bus shelter, 11th July
item.description:
The gang tag graffiti ‘OTAP’ has been sprayed in black on the bus shelter at Rowley Gardens next to the boundary fence of Finsbury Park on Green Lanes, Manor House. Please can it be removed before further gang tag graffiti appears. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lanes, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Several tags in yellow paint, 11th July
